import React from "react"; import {Container, Row, Col, Table} from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import DocumentMeta from "react-document-meta"; function LvivNationalMedicalUniversityUkraine() { const meta = { title: "Lviv National Medical University Ukraine | Best Ukraine MBBS College", description: "Lviv National Medical University Ukraine for Indian Students approved by MCI. ✓Eligibility Criteria ✓Admission Procedure ✓Fee Structure ✓Facilities", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/lviv-national-medical-university-ukraine", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "Lviv National Medical University Ukraine" } } }; return (

Lviv National Medical University Ukraine

  • About Lviv National Medical University
  • Indian Student Admission Procedure
  • {" "} Eligibility Criteria of Lviv National Medical University
  • {" "} Requirements for MBBS Admission
  • Lviv National Medical University Fee Structure
  • Lviv National Medical University Facility
  • Lviv National Medical University Advantages for Indian Student
  • New-Lyf Education Authorized Indian Partner
{/* */}

About Lviv National Medical University

Lviv National Medical University is one of the leading{" "} Ukraine medical university {" "} that got the 4th level of accreditation affiliated with the Ministry of Health of Ukraine. The duration of MBBS course in this university is six years including internship. This university is accredited with the MCI & WHO.

Indian Student Admission Procedure

Indian students need to follow the below steps to take admission in Ukraine medical college:

  • {" "} The students need to write an application to the Rector of University for enrollment of studies in the University.
  • {" "} They must fill the application form including full name, permanent address, Date of Birth, citizenship, permanent address, phone number.
  • {" "} When the eligible students receive an invitation letter, they can apply for a student visa in the Ukrainian embassy of the respective country.
  • {" "} They must carry original copy of documents that should be translated into Ukrainian language and legalized by Notary public and by the Ukrainian Embassy in your country.
  • {" "} Then they need to deposit admission fees at the time of the admission process.

Eligibility Criteria of Lviv National Medical University

The eligibility criteria of the students who want to{" "} study MBBS in Ukraine medical university {" "} are as follows:

  • {" "} The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 60% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • {" "} The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission in Ukraine medical college.
  • {" "} There is no requirement of qualifying NEET exam for taking admission to{" "} Ukraine medical university.
  • {" "} The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • {" "} The students must not be more than 25 years of age.
Requirements for MBBS Admission

The necessary documents for taking admission to the best{" "} Ukraine medical university are the following:

  • {" "} A complete filled application form with all accurate details.
  • {" "} Original and photocopies of Passport.
  • {" "} Birth certificates and other mandatory certificates must be submitted to the concerned authority.
  • {" "} Passport size (3cmX4cm) photographs.
  • {" "} Original and a photocopy of mark sheets of both 10th & 12th standard
  • {" "} A scorecard of NEFT (if required)
  • {" "} Transfer certificate from the previous school
  • {" "} Leaving certificate from the concerned school
  • {" "} A certificate of code of conduct must be submitted
  • {" "} The bank copy of guardians must be submitted which indicates that they have sufficient funds to pay the fees.
  • {" "} A medical checkup certificate is also essential
Lviv National Medical University Fee Structure
Particular Annual Fee
Fee in USD (approx) 7,000
Fee in Indian Rupees (approx) 4,90,000
Lviv National Medical University Facility

Lviv National Medical University provides the following facilities:

  • {" "} There are 9 hostels offered with accommodation of 3500 people
  • {" "} It provides reading rooms, computer rooms in hostel premises.
  • {" "} The total area of the university campus is more than 10 hectares.
Lviv National Medical University Advantages for Indian Student

Lviv National Medical University provides the following advantages to the Indian students:

  • {" "} It has more than 150 professors to help students in research and training programs.
  • {" "} It provides 91 PG courses for graduate students.
  • {" "} It provides MBBS coaching in English language.
  • {" "} The fee structure of this Ukraine medical university is quite economical and affordable to all medical students.
  • {" "} There is no requirement of any entrance exam for taking admission in Ukraine medical university.
New-Lyf Authorized Indian Partner

New-Lyf education is the authorized Indian partner with{" "} Ukraine medical university. We have already placed hundreds of Indian students in Ukraine for pursuing MBBS course in Lviv National Medical University that taught MBBS course in English language. We have an expert team of consultants that provide well-researched assistance & comprehensive counseling to the students. We provide complete information about Lviv National Medical University and clear each doubt of the students so that they can study medical course in{" "} Ukraine medical college and fulfill their wish.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience.He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget.✔3500 + Students✔ 15 Countries✔ MBBS, MBA, PG, UG✔ 100 % Commitment✔ Education Loan✔ Job Placements

); } export default LvivNationalMedicalUniversityUkraine
